name: Solar Phoenix
text_description: The Solar Phoenix, a creature of pure Spirit energy, is a beacon in any battle. When ashes fall, the Solar Phoenix rises, restoring 10 HP to all friendly Spirit type cards once per turn.
illustration_description: A large, regal phoenix soars above a sunlit sky, its vibrant golden feathers shimmering with ethereal energy. Its eyes blaze with an intense light. Below, a tranquil landscape bathes in the warmth of the sun, symbolizing revival and vitality.
